Class SocketServerManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am33.network.socket.SocketServerManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
CallableOnClientController, Runnable, Remote
public class SocketServerManager extends Object implements Runnable, CallableOnClientController

  • Constructor Details

    • SocketServerManager

      public SocketServerManager(DNS dns)
      Constructs a new SocketServerManager with the specified DNS.
      Parameters:
      dns - The DNS service to be used by this socket server

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Starts the socket server and listens for incoming client connections. Each client connection is handled in a separate thread from a thread pool. The server continuously accepts new connections until an IOException occurs.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • getWriters

      public Map<String,PrintWriter> getWriters()
      Returns the map of client nickname to PrintWriter objects.
      Returns:
      A map containing PrintWriter objects for connected clients

    • checkWriterStatus

      public void checkWriterStatus(PrintWriter writer, String nickname) throws IOException
      Checks if the given PrintWriter is still valid and removes it from the writers map if not.
      Parameters:
      writer - The PrintWriter to check
      nickname - The nickname associated with the writer
      Throws:
      IOException - If the writer is null or has encountered an error
